projects.title: swole.tech
projects.detail: A workout-related social media application that allows coaches to create and manage workouts for their teams. Log in as 'kim' with no password to see demo content. Created for the PickHacks hackathon at Missouri S&T.

projects.title: Reddit with React
projects.detail: A tutorial created to teach new members of ACM Web the basics of React.

projects.title: Chill
projects.detail: A website that emulates the function of Netflix in order to utilize and show the group's understanding of database design and implementation.
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, MySQL
